SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BigDecimalUtil
Utility class for performing common operations on BigDecimal with a fixed scale and rounding mode, specifically for currency calculations.
JsonParser
Utility class for parsing JSON files containing Order and PaymentMethod data.
Main
Main entry point for the Payment Optimization application.
NotFoundPaymentsException
Exception thrown by the PaymentOptimizer when it cannot find a suitable payment method to pay for a specific order, indicating that a complete payment allocation is not possible under the given constraints and algorithm strategy.
Order
Represents a customer order.
PaymentMethod
Represents a payment method available to the customer.
PaymentOptimizer
Class responsible for optimally allocating payments for a list of orders based on available payment methods and their limits, considering promotion rules.
PaymentOptimizer.PotentialFullPayment
Private static helper class for storing data about a potential full payment for a specific order in the discount payment allocation step (R2 and R4).
Result
Represents the final spending amount for a specific payment method.
